snippet: Julius Reich had been indicted on a murder charge in the stabbing of his wife, Dr. Robin Goldman, who was found dead in their home in January.
abstract: Julius Reich, husband of pediatrician Dr Robin Goldman, pleads not guilty to her stabbing death in couple's Scarsdale, NY, home.
lead_paragraph: Julius Reich had been indicted on a murder charge in the stabbing of his wife, Dr. Robin Goldman, who was found dead in their home in January.

headline.main: Scarsdale Doctor’s Husband Pleads Not Guilty to Killing Her
headline.print_headline: Man Pleads Not Guilty in Wife’s Killing
